devdoc.title: An Auction Contract for bidding and selling single and batched NFTs

makeCustomBid(address,uint256,address).notice: Make a custom bid on ongoing auction that lets bidder set up a NFT recipient as the auction is finished

minimumSettableIncreasePercentage().notice: Default values that are used if not specified by the NFT seller

ownerOfNFT(address,uint256).notice: Read owner of a NFT item

settleAuction(address,uint256).notice: Settle auction when it is finished

takeHighestBid(address,uint256).notice: Owner of NFT can take the highest bid and end the auction

withdrawNft(address,uint256).notice: Cancel auction and withdraw NFT before a bid is made

userdoc.notice: This contract can be used for auctioning any NFTs
